Really fun game! With a lots of things to do after you finish the game. It has a really good story.

A lot of games sit in my backlog for years, and even when I try them, they don't grab my interest.

This game on the other hand?

It's just instantly enjoyable, what can I say. I couldn't put it down until I finished it, and I wanted more once I did.

It has great humour, fantastic gameplay mechanics, it's easy to understand but gives you room for creative development of your skills as you progress, and the appeal is practically applicable for everyone. I can't think of one person that I know that hasn't at least been somewhat interested in this game when they see it, that alone is praise worthy.

Not only that, but as it's a puzzle game, it's intellectually challenging. It's exercise for your brain, and as a result, you can't possibly feel bad about "wasting time" playing it.

I personally think this is a video game Hall of Fame contender, easiest recommendation ever, check it out if you haven't already.

Oh yeah, and it's $1.99 on sale... pretty insane value. o_O
最早是在中学时期接触的portal一代，仿佛开启了新世界的大门，大学后跟舍友连得盗版portal2，虽然只有预设地图，但还是被双人合作惊艳，再后来在steam创意工坊，我仿佛拥有了整个宇宙！
当时我是用破解版的通关的游戏，玩的是2，通关之后觉得只是款神作（只能用神作来表达我的心情）--空旷的环境、只有电流音的背景，让人头皮发麻鸡皮疙瘩的剧情，即使是头晕目眩，我也难以停下要通关的冲动。之后购买了1、2捆绑包，补回了1--The cake is a lie。

Una obra maestra.
Muy buena trama, en especial si ya jugaste el primero que también está muy bueno.
This is one of the most beautiful and interesting game I have ever played.
Uno de los mejores juegos que se pueden encontrar, tanto historia, jugabilidad y dificultad estan hechos a la perfección, obra maestra de valve!

Игра супер. Прошел ее довольно быстро но ни разу не пожалел о потраченых деньгах. В процессе прохождения важна не только реакция, умение быстро нажимать на кнопки и быстро двигать мышью это все конечно присутствует. На мой взгляд в первую очередь тут важна логика и умение видеть те или иные моменты в перспективе и конечно же терпение т.к. некоторые уровни не проходятся с наскоку. В общем игрой остался доволен, когда уровни немножко подзабудуться буду проходить еще разок. :)
Jogo muito bom, e com muito mais puzzles que os anteriores .

Хорошая игра советую тем кто хочет поломать голову

Portal 2 bietet viele knifflige und brilliant ausgefallene Puzzles. Daneben ist zwischendurch auch Reaktion und im Koop Teamwork gefragt. Die humorvolle Story begleitet den Fortschritt. Der Koop Modus ist nach meiner Meinung das Highlight. Dort kommt es zu vielen lustigen Momenten und es ensteht eine tolle Dynamik. Und selbst wenn alle Level mal durchgespielt sind - nach 3, 4 Jahren habe ich alles fast wieder vergessen und kann es nocheinmal von vorne genießen!
It's Portal! Well, if you wanna play a puzzle game with deep storyline, play this game

As a person who loves story driven games. I consider Portal 2 as one of the greatest in the genre which is crazy since the protagonist does not even speak a single line of dialogue. Lots of twists and turns in the story arc that even if you are not good with puzzles (Since Portal series is essentially a puzzle game in itself), you will be motivated or driven by pride to accomplish said tasks. Nice voice acting and soundtrack (especially the epilogue and end credits) brings life to characters and brings more immersion to the game. Game mechanics are unique and makes you question if humanity will ever be able to build a portal gun in the future without violating the fundamental laws of physics (Been watching too much Portal theories in the internet would do that to you).

Only comment is the non-seamless loading of the Source engine which sometimes ruins a frantic pace sequence in the story, but it is understandable for the time period when the game was made.

Overall: 9.5/10
